state: You are now playing a fast paced round of TextWorld! First of all, make an attempt to head east. And then, open the freezer within the canteen. Then, go north. Then, go to the west. And then, try to go south. After that, doublecheck that the door within the shower is opened. And then, go west. Once you accomplish that, move west.
